exchange_update_billing_periode_intro:
Select the desired frequency for automatic renewal of each account.
This will be applied from the next renewal.
exchange_update_billing_periode_delete_w: Please note that this choice implies that the service will expire on the expiry date and the data will be lost. It will be then impossible to recover the account data.
exchange_update_billing_periode_resume: You are about to change the renewal period of your accounts:
exchange_update_billing_periode_success: The renewal periods have been updated for the accounts selected.
exchange_update_billing_periode_partial: Some renewal periods have not been updated.
exchange_update_billing_periode_failure: An error has occurred updating the account renewal periods
